text_2@text.text: Open the following file path by code app §b'Utility UI/ui/_global_variables.json' §fThen set the values to true & false to enable/disable them permanently.

text_4@text.text:
Credits:
Armor HUD & Offhand Slot by §9@ambient

text@text.text: Utility UI is an optimized pack designed to enchant the UI and add useful modules in the UI

locked_text@text.text: Options are locked for Default mode

text@text.text: Insert music by adding a song converted to ogg by the name 'custom_1_song.ogg' & 'custom_2_song.ogg' in 'customize' folder inside Utility UI
You can edit the custom mode inside the Pack Files

item_text_label.text: §9Tap here to return to Default mode
